pr_title: Fix Object UFS edge case again

timeline.message: Fix Object UFS edge case again

timeline.bodyText: can we keep this test case? "s3a://" + BUCKET_NAME + "/test/"
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: No because I don't think /test/ is actually a valid input to this function. It was becuase I thought it was a valid input that I made this mistake.
replies.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText: We can't pass in directory paths to this method? I thought any s3 UFS path can be passed to this method?
replies.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: I think directories are also allowed, since a few lines above, we have "s3a://" + BUCKET_NAME + "/" which is a directory.
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText:
Can we do the full matrix of test cases?
test
test/
/test
/test/

are these also possible?
""
"/"
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: Can we save this normalized root at the top, so both branches can re-use it?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: What is an example where this will make a difference? PathUtils.normalizePath just adds a separator at the end, so does this only apply to the single string s3://bucket?
timeline.author: gpang
bf8086

timeline.bodyText: mRootKeySupplier.get() is a memoized function so don't be concerned about callng twice.
timeline.author: bradyoo
